member.name: T:Acontplus.Persistence.Shared.ConfigurationConnectionStringProvider
member.summary: Default implementation of IConnectionStringProvider using IConfiguration. Supports hierarchical, environment-based, and secure connection string resolution.

member.name: T:Acontplus.Persistence.Shared.Repositories.AuditableBaseRepository`2
member.summary: Repository for auditable entities, adds audit-specific methods.

members.member:
A modern, generic repository implementation for Entity Framework Core, targeting .NET 9+.
TEntity: The type of the entity. TId: The type of the entity's primary key, must be not null.

member.name: M:SqlExceptionExtensions.ToDomainErrors(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Acontplus.Persistence.Shared.Exceptions.SqlDomainException},System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Converts multiple SqlDomainExceptions to a DomainErrors collection
member.param: Optional common details for all errors
